alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Monroe; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Jackson, northwestern Monroe and Trempealeau Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Strum to near Galesville. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Strum around 135 AM CDT. Osseo around 140 AM CDT. Black River Falls around 205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Melrose, Shamrock, Beach Corners, York, Chimney Rock, Perry Creek Recreation Area, North Branch, Eleva and Pleasantville. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
